description: Oozing with two layers of melted cheese, caramelised onions and burger sauce, learn how to make a beef burger in the form of a golden toasted sandwich.
name: Cheesy Beef Burger Toasted Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 white sourdough loaf, cut into 8 slices

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook burgers, turning frequently, for 14 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.
Heat remaining oil in same pan over medium heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 12 minutes or until golden and caramelised. Transfer to a small bowl. Clean pan.

Spray one side of each slice of bread with oil. Place 4 slices of bread, oiledsides down, on a chopping board. Spread with burger sauce. Top with a slice of cheese, burger, onion and remaining cheese. Sandwich with remaining bread slices, oiled-sides up.
Heat pan over medium heat. Cook sandwiches, in batches, for 3 minutes on each side or until bread is golden and cheese has melted.
Meanwhile, prepare salad according to packet instructions. Serve sandwiches with salad.
